extendedInfo.description: Reminders for every occasion! Call Reminder provides a fast and convenient way to schedule reminders for virtually any occasion. Great for professionals or anyone else needing a little more organization in their busy schedule. Call Reminders- Quick creation of callback reminder after each phone call- After-call window provides options for quickly creating a reminder, call note, or calendar event.- Reminder notes shown on call screen during calls with that specific contact- Create cal reminder from call log- Option for automatic creation of call reminder for all calls or missed calls only- Auto-complete text box for selecting contact during reminder creation, just start typing and results are filtered based on what you type- Add repeating alerts to each reminder- Add reminder to device calendar- Choose different ringtone for each reminderMiscellaneous Reminders- General purpose reminders for any occasion (meetings, grocery, laundry, etc.)- Add repeating alerts to each reminder- Add reminder to device calendar- Choose different ringtone for each reminderSMS Reminders- Schedule SMS messages to be sent automatically- Add confirmation prompt at scheduled time of sending or choose to have SMS sent automatically without user intervention.- Schedule repeating SMS remindersCall Notes- Create call notes for any contact that will be displayed on call screen during all calls with that contact- Full customization of call note text, background, etc.Features- Option for persistent notifications that require user intervention before dismissing- Choose how long reminders remain in database after expiration- Option for 24-hour time format- Calendar Integration (Android 4.0+)- Multiple font options- New features coming!

reviews.title: Very very useful
reviews.comment: Alert when to call and actually do the calling. I\'ve tried many apps they are no match.
reviews.author: Wale Bejide

reviews.title: It\'s yeah
reviews.comment: Any thing that\'s good on it you have to up grade and the ago itself is one big reminder of that nice try. Don\'t waste your time the apps these idiots make are really staying to puts me of  dick bone not duck bone
reviews.author: John wolf

reviews.title: Very user friendly
reviews.comment: Good app. It would be great if it can be synced with Google calendar or Google keep. Also please provide the facility to edit call notes.
reviews.author: Vikrant Gupta

reviews.title: Can\'t read call notes during call
reviews.comment: A really handy app with a lot of useful options! Only thing: I cannot read or open call notes during a call. Ther is just a black square blocking half of my contact\'s picture... (Sony Xperia E / Android)
reviews.author: Regina Hinzen

reviews.title: Good attempt. But needs more refinements
reviews.comment: SET REMINDERS has been lagging a lot. Try to refine overall. It\'s still a good app to use. UPDATE has done somethings better than before and somethings weak than before. Specially SET REMIMDERS
reviews.author: Pratik Sanghavi

reviews.title: Good call reminder
reviews.comment: I used Pakumba for a while and it was clean and smart app, but lacked a simple snooze button. This app has almost everything, but lacks missed calls reminders, add to contact function for unknown numbers and few minor features. Still I\'ll buy the full one as upon the whole I quite enjoy it.
reviews.author: Danil Safonov

reviews.title: Ravichandra
reviews.comment: if we remove  after call window from settings,  there will be no notification at all for outgoing calls.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It is great app it helps in.my business
reviews.author: Himanshu Soni

reviews.title: FREE version is too limited. Get something else.
reviews.comment: One of the biggest cons of the free version of this app is that it is severely limited in it\'s functionality as compared to other free apps which offer far more features than this one. This version allows the ability to add a very simple reminder to make a phone call, but if for some reason you want to change it or do anything else to customize it, you can\'t. A not so friendly reminder, more of a nag screen comes up if you try to do so telling you that you must buy the PRO version to enable these features. The developer is just toying with you offering the menu option to edit an added instance and then rudely slaps you in the face when you attempt to do so.    App is pretty much useless and gives almost no customization at all. It is really nothing more than a walking billboard for their other apps and the traditional stage setting for a \"motley crew\" of other useless crap you don\'t need or would never trust the sources of as being credible. Time to look for another app which will better serve your needs. This one is a dead duck. (bone)
reviews.author: A Google User
